response.overview: She is beautiful, talented and the star of an infamous Strip Club. He appears to be a stalker, a disheveled loser with his wheels coming off. His hunger explodes in an impulsive act that gets him tossed into the alley like garbage.  In truth he is a reverse imposter, a man of wealth and notoriety, living alone in his empty mansion, searching for the girl of his dreams. Once his good looks are revealed along with his personal fortune, he is a dream come true for the right girl! Sexy Blondes Share a Stud Cock 12 min
response.title: Fascination
